Jarryd Coetsee (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Obere ihe nkiri ya, The Suit nwetara mmeri ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa.
A mụrụ Coetsee na Pretoria ebe ọ gara Pretoria Boys High School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee na ime ihe nkiri na South Africa na UK
Ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị na-elekọta Coetsenburg, otu n'ime ụlọ mmanya kachasị ochie na South Africa, nke e guzobere n'afọ 1682.

Obere ihe nkiri ya, The Suit, meriri ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa gụnyere Best Short Film Award na 11th SAFTAs ma gosipụta ya na obodo 83 na obodo karịrị mba 20. Ihe nkiri a gosipụtara ihe nkiri nke onye mmeri Tony Award bụ John Kani na Atandwa Kani. Atọ n'ime emume ihe nkiri a họpụtara ya bụ Oscar qualifiers (Urbanworld Film Festival, Pan African Film Festival nakwa BronzeLens Film Festival). Coetsee bụ naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Africa nke Académie des Arts et Techniques du Cinéma họpụtara maka Les Nuits en maọbụ afọ 2017 (Golden Nights 2017) nke hụrụ ya ka ọ sonye na mmemme metụtara ihe nkiri na France, Italy na Gris, ma nata onyinye site n'aka UNESCO n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ya, World Heritage Centre, na Paris maka The Suit nke ahọpụtara dịka otu n'ime obere ihe nkiri iri atọ kachasị elu site na gburugburu ụwa.
